data.title: New Update - 0.3.7-beta
data.content:
ğŸ® Welcome to %@ 0.3.7-beta!

âš ï¸ **Important Change Notice:**

This update will cause games from version 0.3.6-beta or earlier to be unable to scan. To restore functionality, please execute migrate_data.applescript (from any path).

In Terminal, execute:
```
osascript migrate_data.applescript
```

After data conversion, 0.3.6-beta will work normally to scan games.

ğŸ”’ Data Safety: Please regularly back up your Minecraft saves and launcher data
ğŸ› Bug Reports: If you encounter any issues, please report them on our GitHub repository

ğŸ™ Thank you for testing %@ and helping us improve!
